## MapViewOptions.maxVisibleDataSourceTiles property

The maximum number of tiles rendered from one data source at a time.

 See \[\[MapViewDefaults.maxVisibleDataSourceTiles\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
maxVisibleDataSourceTiles?: number;
```
